text: Are humans the next 'horses' of the AI era? Fear of AI automating jobs and rendering human skills obsolete is real. Don't get replaced. Learn to leverage AI, focus on uniquely human creativity & problem-solving. Future-proof your career. #FutureOfWork #AIImpact #CareerGrowth

VCs hate this one trick. Founders chase funding, giving up equity & control for slow growth. Instead, focus on ruthless profitability *first*. Build a revenue engine, not a demo deck. Learn to grow your SaaS without selling your soul. #SaaS #Bootstrapping #GrowthHacking
